import { useState } from 'react'; export default function MedicalForm() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ lastName: '', firstName: '', address: '', birthDate: '', phone: '', email: '', guidedBy: '', gumBleeding: '', toothSensitivity: '', orthoProblems: '', bruxism: '', medicalHistory: {}, pregnant: '', nursing: '', consent: false, consentTimestamp: null }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert('Datele completate:\n' + JSON.stringify(formData, null, 2)); }; return (
